speech: Hello again, #greetingsname.given-name. It me, Soul-Food bot. I'm ready to to make more recommendations to you. Give me ONE word that describe your mood now. For example: 'Neutral' or some other word. You can also choose one : /bored, /calm, /cheerful /excited, /irritated, /neutral, /relaxed, /sad, /tense. Or tell me some other word.

Hello #greetingsname.given-name, it's my pleasure to serve you again today. Tell me how you feeling now. Please use ONE word to describe your mood now. For example: 'Neutral', or some other word. You can also choose one : /bored, /calm, /cheerful /excited, /irritated, /neutral, /relaxed, /sad, /tense. Or tell me some other word.
